channel.title: CVE Feed for Huawei -- EMUI
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Huawei -- EMUI

item.title: CVE-2021-36985|2024-08-04T01:09:07.647Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is a Code injection vulnerability in Huawei Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may exhaust system resources and cause the system to restart.

item.title: CVE-2021-37031|2024-08-04T01:09:07.561Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is a Remote DoS vulnerability in Huawei Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability will cause the app to exit unexpectedly.

item.title: CVE-2021-37115|2024-08-04T01:09:07.794Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is an unauthorized rewriting vulnerability with the memory access management module on ACPU.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect service confidentiality.

item.title: CVE-2021-37092|2024-08-04T01:09:07.701Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is a Incomplete Cleanup vulnerability in Huawei Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may lead to availability affected.

item.title: CVE-2021-36996|2024-08-04T01:09:07.341Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is an Improper verification vulnerability in Huawei Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause transmission of certain virtual information.

item.title: CVE-2021-36987|2024-08-04T01:09:07.694Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is a issue that nodes in the linked list being freed for multiple times in Huawei Smartphone due to race conditions. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability can cause the system to restart.

item.title: CVE-2021-37039|2024-08-04T01:09:07.540Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is an Input verification vulnerability in Huawei Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause Bluetooth DoS.

item.title: CVE-2021-37050|2024-08-04T01:09:07.742Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is a Missing sensitive data encryption vulnerability in Huawei Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect service confidentiality.

item.title: CVE-2021-37034|2024-08-04T01:09:07.359Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is an Unstandardized field names in Huawei Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect service confidentiality.

item.title: CVE-2021-36999|2024-08-04T01:09:07.370Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is a Buffer overflow vulnerability in Huawei Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability by sending malicious images and inducing users to open the images may cause remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2021-37032|2024-08-04T01:09:07.564Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is a Bypass vulnerability in Huawei Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause Digital Balance to fail to work.

item.title: CVE-2021-37038|2024-08-04T01:09:07.635Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is an Improper access control vulnerability in Huawei Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect service confidentiality.

item.title: CVE-2021-37114|2024-08-04T01:09:07.804Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is an Out-of-bounds read vulnerability in Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect service confidentiality.

item.title: CVE-2021-37002|2024-08-04T01:09:07.593Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is a Memory out-of-bounds access vulnerability in Huawei Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause malicious code to be executed.

item.title: CVE-2021-36997|2024-08-04T01:09:07.563Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is a Low memory error in Huawei Smartphone due to the unlimited size of images to be parsed.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause the Gallery or Files app to exit unexpectedly.

item.title: CVE-2021-36994|2024-08-04T01:09:07.485Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is a issue that trustlist strings being repeatedly inserted into the linked list in Huawei Smartphone due to race conditions. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability can cause exceptions when managing the system trustlist.

item.title: CVE-2021-36992|2024-08-04T01:09:07.608Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is a Public key verification vulnerability in Huawei Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect service confidentiality.

item.title: CVE-2021-37040|2024-08-04T01:09:07.651Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is a Parameter injection vulnerability in Huawei Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause privilege escalation of files after CIFS share mounting.

item.title: CVE-2021-36986|2024-08-04T01:09:07.316Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is a vulnerability of tampering with the kernel in Huawei Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may escalate permissions.

item.title: CVE-2021-37051|2024-08-04T01:09:07.672Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is an Out-of-bounds read vulnerability in Huawei Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause out-of-bounds memory access.

item.title: CVE-2021-37055|2024-08-04T01:09:07.746Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is a Logic bypass vulnerability in Huawei Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may allow attempts to obtain certain device information.

item.title: CVE-2021-37046|2024-08-04T01:09:07.728Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is a Memory leak vulnerability with the codec detection module in Huawei Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause the device to restart due to memory exhaustion.

item.title: CVE-2021-36995|2024-08-04T01:09:07.560Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is an Unauthorized file access vulnerability in Huawei Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability by modifying soft links may tamper with the files restored from backups.

item.title: CVE-2021-37133|2024-08-04T01:16:03.180Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is an Unauthorized file access vulnerability in Smartphones.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect service confidentiality.

item.title: CVE-2021-37027|2024-08-04T01:09:07.635Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is a DoS vulnerability in smartphones. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect service integrity.

item.title: CVE-2021-36989|2024-08-04T01:09:07.380Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is a Kernel crash vulnerability in Huawei Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may escalate permissions.

item.title: CVE-2021-37047|2024-08-04T01:09:07.767Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is an Input verification vulnerability in Huawei Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause some services to restart.

item.title: CVE-2021-37044|2024-08-04T01:09:07.792Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is a Permission control vulnerability in Huawei Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect service availability.

item.title: CVE-2021-37035|2024-08-04T01:09:07.666Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is a Remote DoS vulnerability in Huawei Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability will cause the app to exit unexpectedly.

item.title: CVE-2021-37074|2024-08-04T01:09:07.702Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is a Race Condition vulnerability in Huawei Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may lead to the user root privilege escalation.

item.title: CVE-2021-37056|2024-08-04T01:09:07.866Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is an Improper permission control vulnerability in Huawei Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may allow attempts to obtain certain device information.

item.title: CVE-2021-37103|2024-08-04T01:09:07.810Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is an improper permission management vulnerability in the Wallet apps. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect service confidentiality.

item.title: CVE-2021-37041|2024-08-04T01:09:07.690Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is an Improper verification vulnerability in Huawei Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause out-of-bounds read.

item.title: CVE-2021-37111|2024-08-04T01:09:07.760Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is a Memory leakage vulnerability in Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause memory exhaustion.

item.title: CVE-2021-36998|2024-08-04T01:09:07.642Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is an Improper verification vulnerability in Huawei Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may allow attempts to read an array that is out of bounds.

item.title: CVE-2021-37029|2024-08-04T01:09:07.674Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is an Identity verification vulnerability in Huawei Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect service availability.

item.title: CVE-2021-37001|2024-08-04T01:09:07.756Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is a Register tampering vulnerability in Huawei Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may allow the register value to be modified.

item.title: CVE-2021-37093|2024-08-04T01:09:07.796Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is a Improper Access Control vulnerability in Huawei Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may lead to attackers steal short messages.

item.title: CVE-2021-37117|2024-08-04T01:09:07.854Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is a Service logic vulnerability in Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause WLAN DoS.

item.title: CVE-2021-37096|2024-08-04T01:09:07.811Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is a Improper Input Validation vulnerability in Huawei Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may lead to user privacy disclosed.

item.description: There is a Service logic vulnerability in Huawei Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause WLAN DoS.

item.title: CVE-2021-37052|2024-08-04T01:09:07.743Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is an Exception log vulnerability in Huawei Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause address information leakage.

item.title: CVE-2021-37119|2024-08-04T01:09:07.810Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is a Service logic vulnerability in Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause WLAN DoS.

item.title: CVE-2021-37049|2024-08-04T01:09:07.723Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is a Heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability in Huawei Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may rewrite the memory of adjacent objects.

item.title: CVE-2021-37045|2024-08-04T01:09:07.856Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is an UAF vulnerability in Huawei Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause the device to restart unexpectedly and the kernel-mode code to be executed.

item.title: CVE-2021-37069|2024-08-04T01:09:07.799Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is a Race Condition vulnerability in Huawei Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may lead to availability affected.

item.title: CVE-2021-37113|2024-08-04T01:09:07.715Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is a Privilege escalation vulnerability with the file system component in Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect service confidentiality.

item.description: There is a Parameter verification issue in Huawei Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability can affect service integrity.

item.description: There is a vulnerability of tampering with the kernel in Huawei Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may escalate permissions.

item.description: There is an Injection attack vulnerability in Huawei Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect service availability.

item.description: There is an Invalid address access vulnerability in Huawei Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause the device to restart.

item.description: There is a security protection bypass vulnerability with the modem.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause memory protection failure.

item.description: There is an Improper verification vulnerability in Huawei Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause out-of-bounds read.

item.description: There is an Improper permission vulnerability in Huawei Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect service availability.

item.description: There is a Code Injection vulnerability in Huawei Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may lead to system restart.

item.description: There is an Unauthorized file access vulnerability in Huawei Smartphone due to unstandardized path input.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability by creating malicious file paths can cause unauthorized file access.

item.title: CVE-2021-37054|2024-08-04T01:09:07.700Z -- huawei -- emui
